Docs.summary: This class is used to specify meta information of a subtype contained in a spell checker.

remarks.para: This class is used to specify meta information of a subtype contained in a spell checker. Subtype can describe locale (e.g. en_US, fr_FR...) used for settings.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The locale supported by the subtype
The extra value of the subtype

remarks.para: Constructor.

This member is deprecated. There is no public API that requires developers to directly instantiate custom SpellCheckerSubtype objects right now. Hence only the system is expected to be able to instantiate SpellCheckerSubtype object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Function GetDisplayName (context As Context, packageName As String, appInfo As ApplicationInfo) As String
public: System::String ^ GetDisplayName(Android::Content::Context ^ context, System::String ^ packageName, Android::Content::PM::ApplicationInfo ^ appInfo);
public string? GetDisplayName (Android.Content.Context? context, string? packageName, Android.Content.PM.ApplicationInfo? appInfo);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetDisplayName(class Android.Content.Context context, string packageName, class Android.Content.PM.ApplicationInfo appInfo) cil managed
member this.GetDisplayName : Android.Content.Context * string * Android.Content.PM.ApplicationInfo -> string

Docs.param: Context will be used for getting Locale and PackageManager.
The package name of the spell checker
The application info of the spell checker
Docs.returns: a display name for this subtype. The string resource of the label (mSubtypeNameResId) can have only one %s in it. If there is, the %s part will be replaced with the locale's display name by the formatter. If there is not, this method simply returns the string specified by mSubtypeNameResId. If mSubtypeNameResId is not specified (== 0), it's up to the framework to generate an appropriate display name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.returns: a display name for this subtype. The string resource of the label (mSubtypeNameResId) can have only one %s in it. If there is, the %s part will be replaced with the locale's display name by the formatter. If there is not, this method simply returns the string specified by mSubtypeNameResId. If mSubtypeNameResId is not specified (== 0), it's up to the framework to generate an appropriate display name.
